attributes.action: Allow learner drivers to continue practicing driving  during England lockdowns.
attributes.background: Allow learner drivers to continue practicing for their practical driving test throughout UK lockdowns. The roads are much quieter so allows us learners to feel more comfortable with learning and will help to relive the amount of failed practical tests once the lockdown is lifted.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063

Under current Government guidance, you can practise driving with members of your household or support bubble. It must be travel for work, education or other essential journeys: https://www.gov.uk/driving-lessons-learning-to-drive/practising-with-family-or-friends
